channel.title: Problem with Deobfuscating Client
channel.description:
OK, i've got a few problems with popcorn89's Deobber.
1. The version.def is outdated, and if someone coudl be so nice as to give me an updated one, i would greatly appreciate it. Because everytime i try to deob a client, it says "Checking RuneScape Version...FAILED".
2. I get a NullPointerException when i try deobbing the client. it doesn't do the decompiling. It gets runescape.jar, but it doesn't decompile any classes. How do i fix that?

item.title: Problem with Deobfuscating Client
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

or you could just simply not suck

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with Deobfuscating Client
item.dc:creator: @ownagesbot ownagesbot
item.description:
@ownagesbot wrote:

isn’t – a + and — a -? unless your increasing/decreasing such as int++; etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with Deobfuscating Client
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

i did decompile it separately. i still get the same error. I just got the dk.class (class27) and decopmiled it, and renamed the 2 things that were in it. I renamed “static final Object a” to “static final Object method390”, and “static final void a” to “static final void method391”. (like it says in the ZKM ChangeLog.txt). and i still get the same error.

and i found no “—”'s. i found --'s but that was for decrementing.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with Deobfuscating Client
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“qauters, post:2, topic:227155”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=298492.msg2397790#msg2397790 date=1219261811]
OK, i’ve got a few problems with popcorn89’s Deobber.

  1. The version.def is outdated, and if someone coudl be so nice as to give me an updated one, i would greatly appreciate it. Because everytime i try to deob a client, it says “Checking RuneScape Version…FAILED”.

  2. I get a NullPointerException when i try deobbing the client. it doesn’t do the decompiling. It gets runescape.jar, but it doesn’t decompile any classes. How do i fix that?
    [/quote]
    It’s been said before… alot…
    Why care about the version.
    Run deob.
    Get the runescape.jar
    Remove the native… folder from it (including the class file in it)
    press deob again.
    Fix the few errors in it ( to int[] and — to -)
    add the removed folder back to your deob.[/quote]I thought you changed “—” to “–” :-. Oh well, that explains a lot :).[quote=“zyle1992, post:3, topic:227155”]thanks for that. i just need one more thing. the files for the JSObject class.[/quote]
    Decompile it separately.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with Deobfuscating Client
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

thanks for that. i just need one more thing. the files for the JSObject class.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with Deobfuscating Client
item.dc:creator: @qauters qauters
item.description:
@qauters wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:1, topic:227155”]OK, i’ve got a few problems with popcorn89’s Deobber.

  1. The version.def is outdated, and if someone coudl be so nice as to give me an updated one, i would greatly appreciate it. Because everytime i try to deob a client, it says “Checking RuneScape Version…FAILED”.

  2. I get a NullPointerException when i try deobbing the client. it doesn’t do the decompiling. It gets runescape.jar, but it doesn’t decompile any classes. How do i fix that?[/quote]
    It’s been said before… alot…
    Why care about the version.
    Run deob.
    Get the runescape.jar
    Remove the native… folder from it (including the class file in it)
    press deob again.
    Fix the few errors in it ( to int[] and — to -)
    add the removed folder back to your deob.

Read full topic
